import React from 'react'; import "./Post.css"; import { MoreVert } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { Users } from "../../dummyDate"; export default function Post( {post} ) { const [like, setLike] = useState(0); return (
user.id === post.id)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className='postProfileImg'/> {Users.filter(user => user.id === post.id)[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
handLike()} /> {like}人がいいねを押しました
{post.comment}
); }
